subject: Golf
Presidents Cup (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Steve Stricker, a five-time Presidents Cup player, was named by Jay Haas, the United States captain, as the third captain’s assistant for this year’s match-play competition.
snippet: Steve Stricker, a five-time Presidents Cup player, was named by Jay Haas, the United States captain, as the third captain’s assistant for this year’s match-play competition.
